N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7634.1 - Policy

State Regulations

The use of chemical agents in a correctional facility shall
be controlled and reasonably applied only when necessary to protect the safety, security and good order of the facility. Chemical agents when used
appropriately by trained facility staff under certain conditions have proven to
be an effective method in preventing the loss of authority without resorting to
physical contact or deadly physical force. Notes
